title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Introducing the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR! This versatile and compact adapter is the perfect companion for your travels to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, and many more countries. With its 4 in 1 outlet design, you can easily charge multiple devices simultaneously.

The VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter features a 3 prong grounded plug, ensuring a safe and secure connection. It also comes with 2 USB ports, allowing you to conveniently charge your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electronic devices. The dual USB output provides a fast charging speed of up to 2.4A, so you can quickly power up your devices on the go.

Not only is this adapter functional, but it is also incredibly lightweight and compact. Its dimensions of 2.8*2.6*2.3 inches make it easy to pack and carry with you wherever you go. Plus, it is CE and FCC certified, guaranteeing its quality and safety.

Worried about compatibility? Don't be! The VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter is compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs. It supports a wide voltage range of 100V-250V, making it suitable for use with various devices.

We also offer a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, ensuring your satisfaction with your purchase. Please note that this adapter is not a converter, so make sure your devices support 100V-250V dual voltage for low power electronics.

Upgrade your travel essentials with the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR. Stay connected and powered up wherever you go. Order yours today!

The VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter is compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs, making it easy to use with your existing devices. It supports a maximum capacity of 2500 watts, 250 volts, and 10 amps, ensuring a reliable and efficient charging experience.
